subtitleNullable: Anime dataset of 17000 animes with image urls.
descriptionNullable:
**MyAnimeList Database 2023**'

This dataset contains information about 17.562 anime. In particular, this dataset contain:

- Anime List with all the necessary information with image urls of all the anime.
- Information about anime like Genres, Japanese Name, Type, etc are included.
- The data is the latest data scrapped from Myanimelist website.

Also, the code used to collect the data is available at https://github.com/peace027/Anime_Collaborative_Filtering_Recommendation_Model.

***Warning: this dataset includes information about anime for adults (hentai).***

Content
The data was scrapped between July 15th and July 22th.

Anime_Data.csv contain general information of every anime (17.562 different anime) like Genres, Japanese Name, Type, etc. This file have the following columns:
- MAL_ID: MyAnimelist ID of the anime. (e.g. 1)
- Name: full name of the anime. (e.g. Cowboy Bebop)
- Score: average score of the anime given from all users in MyAnimelist database. (e.g. 8.78)
- Genres: comma separated list of genres for this anime. (e.g. Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Sci-Fi, Space)
- English name: full name in english of the anime. (e.g. Cowboy Bebop)
- Japanese name: full name in japanses of the anime. (e.g. カウボーイビバップ)
- Type: TV, movie, OVA, etc. (e.g. TV)
- Episodes': number of chapters. (e.g. 26)
- Aired: broadcast date. (e.g. Apr 3, 1998 to Apr 24, 1999)
- Source: Manga, Light novel, Book, etc. (e.g Original)
- Duration: duration of the anime per episode (e.g 24 min. per ep.)
- Status: status of the anime (e.g Finished Airing)
- Rating: age rate (e.g. R - 17+ (violence & profanity))
- Ranked: position based in the score. (e.g 28)
- Popularity: position based in the the number of users who have added the anime to their list. (e.g 39)
- Synopsis: a brief summary of the anime written by one of the reviews of the anime.
- ImageURLs: list of url links for every anime.

*Acknowledgements*
Thanks to:
- MyAnimeList for providing anime data.

*Inspiration*
- Use this information to display recommendations along with the anime details.

*Ideas to the future*
- Build the same dataset with manga and novel.
